item.title: Can't open chest unless you have enough inventory space?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

if(objectID == 2361){
if(freeSlots >= 2){
addItem(0000, 1);
} else {
sM(“You need atleast 2 free inventory slots to open this.”);
}
}

item.title: Can't open chest unless you have enough inventory space?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Torax Owner Torax
item.description:
@Owner_Torax wrote:

if((objectID == 2361) && (playerItems < 26)){
addItem(0000, 1);

Okay how do I make this chest so if you don’t have atleast 2 spaces in your inventory you can’t open it?

I tried using (playerItems < 26) but it won’t work.

Please help Thanks
